title: Pricing Plans
subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs

premium.name: Premium Plan
premium.description: Ideal for professionals who need frequent file processing

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I upgrade to premium?
faq.a1: Click the 'Upgrade Now' button and you'll be directed to a secure payment page to complete your subscription.
faq.q2: What are the advantages of the premium version?
faq.a2: Premium version offers more processing opportunities, larger file support, multiple format support, and processing history.
faq.q3: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a3: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time and continue using until the end of your current billing cycle.
faq.a4: We use encrypted transmission and secure storage, automatically deleting files after processing to ensure your data security.
